text:
<@U03ADFUTHDW>
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/all/contacts/all?hapikey=demo&count=2>```
i had doubt regarding this api is the max limit for count 100 or can we fetch more than that

Yes, but for that you'll have to repeat the api. Every api call will provide you next page code and you'll have to used it for second call.
Let me share you an example.
<@U03ADFUTHDW> Please give an example and also there is issue with limit and offset in this endpoint please check it

Do try with this new api version.
Doc: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>

Api endpoint: <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts>
You'll get the pagination result at the bottom of the response with the API endpoint for next page like this
<@U03ADFUTHDW> does this work with old api endpoint ?
I'm not sure, But the old version was not supporting the pagination I guess.
So if possible, do switch to new one.
And as you know API key will not going to work after the 30th Nov.

yes but for getting contacts we are using old api but with private acess token
will this work or not <@U03ADFUTHDW>
And also old api was supporting
```&timeOffset=${timeOffset}&vidOffset=${vidOffset}```
will this be supported or not in older version
Yes, this will be as it is.

<@U03ADFUTHDW> while using this endpoint we used to get vidoffset and timeoffset for reference but now we are not getting it can you please help with this issue
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/dynamic>```
can you please say how i can fetch all contacts with bearer token with an example

topic:

API-based chat and idea sharing!
text:
set the channel topic: :octagonal_sign: HubSpot Support is not Provided in this Developer Community Slack :octagonal_sign: For specific support requests, please start at <https://help.HubSpot.com/>

API-based chat and idea sharing!
Hi, is there a way to only disable page tracking in an external domain? Thanks.
Has anyone figured out a way to search a Label Value pair via the search API? :open_mouth:
Search for the label value or the real value?
Label, sorry lol. Value it seems to do fine but labels :v
Is this for owners or teams?

If not probably the best way to do this for now would be to create a duplicate property were the internal value is the labels. Until we get the ability to search with properties labels like this `hs_owner_id.label`
yeah was more of just a crazy idea I was thinking of lol thanks for your time Carter

Of course, and an even crazier idea would be to setup a one time workflow that would get all the single select fields for a certain object type and then it would create more select fields whose values reflect the labels of the original select
If we're talking crazy ideas, then lets get nuts. hahaha

I don’t think HubSpot would want to allow pricing via API but Hub plan/access would be nice.

You would just have to ask the user or make your feature/plan require specific Hubs (like <@U01QVR44MEY> offers or scope request).
lol

Hello, Does anybody know how to get the order/sorting information for line items. Listing them the same way the HubSpot UI has them on the deal record?

By default it seems to be showing the order it was originally added to the deal.
That order doesn’t update based on using the UI to re order.

Not finding a field designating it. I have tried looking at all the deal properties, Line item properties and the association apis.

What am I missing? Where else can I look.

Hello, I have a question, does anyone know if they changed for the Endpoints in HubSpot Files API?

before I had a configured query, and it worked fine, today I tried it, and it no longer worked, I went back to check the endpoints, and now it works fine to have `accept: application/json` and `content-type application/json` whereas before it only required `content-type application/json`

 If this change, someone would be so kind to tell me the end points that changed, so I can change locally, thank you very much.

Hello everyone,

is there any way to get all the possible values of industries using HubSpot api? This is asked <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Is-there-an-endpoint-to-get-industry-property-value-list/m-p/382155|a few times> in the community but I couldn’t read any solution to the problem.

thank you in advance.
<@U03ADFUTHDW> Can you please say how i can fetch contacts in 100 of chuncks

Hello <@U048B8BAY15>
Yes. sure
<@U03ADFUTHDW> any example on fetching contacts in 100 chunks please

Sorry for the delay. But I'm bit stuck in my work.
Till then hope you will find some solution in docs.
i am checking it if i get it i will update to you
